tldr: Affected versions of this package are prone to deadlocks during large file uploads due to a data race in the `Worker.run()` function. This issue arises in specific scenarios and can cause the system to hang, disrupting the upload process and, depending on your system setup, cause Denial of Service (DoS).
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `minio` library to the patch version.
